name: web-test-framework-abn-amro
description: ABN AMRO web automation framework assignment

scripts.test:all: export DEBUG=N && export HEADLESS=N && npx wdio wdio.conf.ts
scripts.test:ci: export DEBUG=Y && export HEADLESS=Y && npx wdio wdio.conf.ts
scripts.test:headlessmode: export DEBUG=N && export HEADLESS=Y && npx wdio wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression
scripts.test:debugmode: export DEBUG=Y && export HEADLESS=N && npx wdio wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression
scripts.test: export DEBUG=N && export HEADLESS=N && npx wdio wdio.conf.ts --cucumberOpts.tagExpression=@test

author: SURIYAKUMAR MANOHARAN
